mapper.select: select tv.id, tv.videoImg,tv.videoTitle,tv.videoinfo from t_video tv INNER JOIN t_teacher tt on tv.teacherId=tt.id inner join (select tt.id, sum(tv.quantity) as tsum from t_video tv INNER JOIN t_teacher tt on tv.teacherId=tt.id group by tt.id) tsum on tt.id=tsum.id where tsum.tsum>400 and tv.quantity>100 and tv.videoStatus=2
select tv.id,tv.videoName,tv.videoImg,tv.videoTitle,tv.videoinfo from t_video tv where tv.videoTime>DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and tv.videoStatus=2
select tv.id,tv.videoName,tv.videoImg,tv.videoTitle,tv.videoinfo from t_video tv where tv.videoStatus=3
